== Welcome to Russian Ubuntu Team ==

<nowiki>[[File:RussianTeam/logo_ru.png|Ubuntu-Ru|align=right]]</nowiki>

We are approved Team since Mar 31 2009:
* <nowiki>[[RussianTeam-ApprovalApplication|Approval Application]]</nowiki> (approved)
* <nowiki>[[RussianTeam-ReApprovalApplication|ReApproval Application 2010]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[LoCoCouncil-Agenda-20100420#Summary|reapproved]]</nowiki>)
* <nowiki>[[RussianTeam-ReApprovalApplication2012|ReApproval Application 2012]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[LoCoCouncil-Minutes-20120717#Votes|reapproved]]</nowiki>)

More on activity:
* <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-ru/events/history|Events history]]</nowiki> at LoCo Teams Portal
* <nowiki>[[RussianTeam-TeamReports|Team Reports]]</nowiki>

=== Our Primary Goals ===

* Support for Russian-speaking users
* Improve Russian localization
* Spread the word of Ubuntu to everyone
* Share Ubuntu CD's with others
* and much more

=== Our Resources (In Russian) ===

* ''http://ubuntu.ru/'' - web site
* ''http://forum.ubuntu.ru/'' - support forum
* ''http://help.ubuntu.ru/'' - documentation wiki
* ''http://team.ubuntu.ru/'' - team wiki
* ''https://launchpad.net/ubuntu-ru'' - Activity tracking at LP
* ''#ubuntu-ru'' on freenode.net - IRC support channnel
* ''ubuntu-ru''@''lists.ubuntu.com'' - support maillist
* ''ubuntu''@''conference.jabber.ru'' - Jabber support channel
* ''loco''@''conference.ubuntu.ru'' - Jabber LoCo channel

=== Members ===

We are keeping our LoCo as a group of city subteams and working subteams to organize our members' activity.

See complete list at Launchpad: https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-ru/+members

We want to thank all former members who helped us!
